data.name: Tactical Recon
data.detailed_description:
Looking for an epic game with tens of thousands of hours with gameplay... look further!

But if you rather play a fun game, short levels with good variation and some bloody violence, this one might be it!

Made by a gamer dude that is far over thirty, who wished he made this one for the Amiga 500 back in 1987 when he was five, the results shows retro style with many suits, weapons and bombs!

* 2D Retro platform shooter.

* Story with voice acting.

* Made with smaller levels, easy to pick up.
data.about_the_game:
Looking for an epic game with tens of thousands of hours with gameplay... look further!

But if you rather play a fun game, short levels with good variation and some bloody violence, this one might be it!

Made by a gamer dude that is far over thirty, who wished he made this one for the Amiga 500 back in 1987 when he was five, the results shows retro style with many suits, weapons and bombs!

* 2D Retro platform shooter.

* Story with voice acting.

* Made with smaller levels, easy to pick up.
data.short_description: Battle your way through many levels in an epic journey to free your country from an enemy invasion in this 2D action game, gather gold and buy more stuff, that you probably would not buy in real life.. like a double barrel shotgun with split-in-two-fire-two-ways mechanism! Or even a Jet pack!
